io.github.ocelot.client

Interface TooltipRenderer


  • public interface TooltipRenderer

    Reduces the view of Screen to just the tooltip rendering portion.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    See Also:
    Screen

                           int posX,
                           int posY)
        Renders the tooltip for the specified ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to render the tooltip of
        posX - The x position to render the tooltip at
        posY - The t position to render the tooltip at

      • renderTooltip

        default void renderTooltip(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                           int posX,
                           int posY,
                           net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer fontRenderer)
        Renders the tooltip for the specified ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - The stack to render the tooltip of
        posX - The x position to render the tooltip at
        posY - The t position to render the tooltip at
        fontRenderer - The font to use when rendering the text if the stack provides no custom font renderer

        posX - The x position to render the tooltip at
        posY - The y position to render the tooltip at
